MeIntro: ^Me: Hello and Welcome to the Quackery Shop!
MeConclusion: ^Me: And Thank you so much for your support.
CoolingWaterMe: ^Me: Cools your head, cools your heart,
^Me: Cooling Water is the only solution
EchinaceaTinctureMe: ^Me: If you can pronunce it, I give it for free...
GeckoMe: ^Me: It tastes better than it looks
^Me: Some says it helps climbing at the walls if you see what I *quack*!
SeaHorseMe: ^Me: No you don't eat it. You put it in water
^Me: Sometimes it comes back to life, but it's rare and unlucky.
BlackTourmalineMe: ^Me: Tour-Ma-Line, reduced waist line nearly garanteed.
CrystalBraceletMe: ^Me: Made of the purest crystals found up the Killingmanjaro
CrystalRingMe: ^Me: If you shine a sun ray in the crystal of the ring in someone eye,
^Me: you obtain a wonderful blinding effect
JedJaspere: ^Me: No, I don't what this is either.
^Me: But it can't be bad can it?
LapisLazuliMe: ^Me: Lapis means wolf. This baby is powerful, believe me.
MalachiteMe: ^Me: You throw it on a hard surface to your naked feet.
^Me: The resulting bleeding is eliminates the bad vibes.
RoseQuartzCrystalMe: ^Me: It's also very pretty on a shelf.
CordycepsMe: ^Me: It's called like that because it acts on the Cordycep muscle.
^Me: It's the muscle in your back that links all your different nervous systems
ElderberryJamMe: ^Me: I like it on a test in the morning,
^Me: but it's also very useful for concentration
FireCiderMe: ^Me: Don't worry, it's completely safe to drink.
^Me: It works also on blocked pipes.
LavenderPerfumeMe: ^Me: This is a special edition, that mixes Lavender from the South of France and the sweat of the women who picked the flowers.
MagicMushroomsMe: ^Me: You won't believe it, they ground in my backyard
NettleBalmMe: ^Me: It brings the itches inward where they are easier to mend.
PlaintainGummyMe: ^Me: Two gummy and you're full of energy for the day.
SeaMossGummyMe: ^Me: Some claims they can hold their breath longer after eating a full can of gummies.
TigerEyeEssenceMe: ^Me: No it's not made of tiger... of course not
WildFlowerSodaMe: ^Me: It pops, it fizzes, don't shake it to hard, the bottle may explode.
BadVibesSprayMe: ^Me: I use it on my postman every morning. I don't get any advertisment in the post anymore.
EvilEyeMe: ^Me: Very powerful stuff, never carry it around mirrors. It backfires.
GreenSaltsMe: ^Me: The green comes from opposum's saliva. We give them lime and tequila and after that they naturally lick the salt.
^Me: We do donate to Opposum AA centers, it's a serious issue.
LoveSpellMe: ^Me: I've got tons of people ordering it for themselve. It works great for self-love.
LuckPotionMe: ^Me: Look, I had some this morning and now, I'm lucking to talk to you!
ManifestationJournalMe: ^Me: Work wonders to haunt your neighbors. Careful, never read it backward.
^Me: Not sure why, I've been told so.
PendulumMe: ^Me: It can locate anything. especially if it is closeby and magnetic.
SigilStickerMe: ^Me: One them is for the fridge, stick on the door and it keeps the food fresher longer.
SleepPouchMe: ^Me: Mix very well in coffee for vivid dreams experiences.
SmudgeStickMe: ^Me: Works on ghosts and burnt dinner smoke.
SuccessCandleMe: ^Me: I wouldn't be here without that one. We tried selling the FailCandle but it didn't catch on.
TarotDeckMe: ^Me: Very useful to look cool in parties. I recommend removing the bad cards.
Skill2ForthePriceOf1Me: ^Me: This is your lucky day! A special promotion for my favorite client!
SkillPriceAnchoringMe: ^Me: And you see, if we do that and that, you get this amazing deal!
SkillTechnicalGlitchMe: ^Me: Oh, wait sorry, I'm entering a tunnel, there might be some minor visual glitches.
ClientIntro: ^Client: Hi, I feel like crap, I'm looking something to make my life better
ClientFailed: ^Client: You're a fraud, I'm outta here
